name: Ugly Betty No Internet Gunfight
description:
Tested in win7 , win 10. (Amx mode x )

Set the video options to your computer's running pixels.

Like, if your computer is 3000*2000 pixels, you set it to 3000*2000.

Open the game with the .bat file.( ha...prepare for bugs:)

Phoenix: There was a mode of Counter Strike 1.6 made by  Wang in 2016.

Jett: Someone added a few new features and posted it here.

Phoenix: Added zoom in ability for "smg " guns and Fn-Fal.

Jett: Added advanced crosshair from DOWNLOAD_CS.NET.

Phoenix: Aim your guns directly 90 degrees to the ground and fire one bullet .

Jett: Then you are sent to the air and land with 0 falling damage.

Phoenix: Use this ability to jump across large obstacles like walls and garbage cans.

Jett: This plugin is from AMXX.PL. Thanks.

Phoenix: Press "Q" and you see your speed bar on top of the screen.

Jett: Then enter "P" and you run at 1,000 pixels per second.

Phoenix: You can see flames being formed after you.

Jett: Press "Q" again to return to normal speed. And , BLA BLA BLA.

Phoenix: This plugin is from "www.Amx Mode X". Thanks.

Jett: There are many maps. Some are made in 2000, others made in 2014 and stuff.

Phoenix: Music will toggle on after entering a map after a smiling voice.

Jett: These new maps are of good quality. Though, the District 9 is badly waypointed.

Phoenix: You should visit it. It looks like home.

Jett: These map makers suffer so much.

Phoenix: Ha. You really should play it.

Jett: The counter strike websites mentioned above are unexpectedly friendly!

Phoenix: Yeah. They all use smiling emojis.

Jett: Ah! My usp is broken!

Phoenix: Attention! Right click while using Usp will cause the gun to break in 4 seconds! Some one fix this bug?

Jett: Well, our time is about to end. Some last words?

Phoenix: Well. Where is Phoenix and Jett in the game?

Jett: U...... At least we have a Phoenix named terrorist and Special Air Service?

Phoenix: Woah! Take what we can get then. I love you!

Jett: What?

Time ended here. Girls and boys,  death can be cute. We will all face it. Thank you.
